text: Hidekazu Otani (born 6 November 1984) is a former Japanese football player. ==Club statistics== Kashiwa ReysolNippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 32 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 65 out of 289) Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Asia Asia Other Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup AFC AFC Total Total 2003 Kashiwa Reysol J1 League 4 0 – 5 0 – – 9 0 2004 16 1 1 0 4 1 – – 21 2 2005 20 3 2 2 2 0 – 2Relegation play-off J1/JSL 0 26 5 2006 J2 League 29 1 – – – – 29 1 2007 J1 League 31 0 1 0 2 0 – – 34 0 2008 33 3 4 0 5 0 – – 42 3 2009 20 1 2 0 3 0 – – 25 1 2010 J2 League 35 2 3 0 – – – 38 2 2011 J1 League 28 0 3 0 2 0 – 4Club World Cup 0 33 0 2012 31 1 6 0 4 0 6 0 1Japan Supercup 0 48 1 2013 31 0 2 0 4 0 9 0 1Japan Supercup 0 47 0 2014 30 0 2 1 10 0 – 1Suruga Bank Cup 0 43 1 2015 31 2 3 0 – 9 1 1Suruga Bank Cup 0 43 3 2016 20 1 2 0 4 0 – – 26 2 2017 32 5 3 0 – – – 35 5 2018 25 0 2 0 3 1 6 0 – 36 1 2019 J2 League 30 0 1 0 1 0 – – 32 0 2020 J1 League 23 2 – 3 0 – – 26 2 2021 6 1 1 0 1 0 – – 8 0 2022 4 0 – 3 0 – – 7 0 Total 478 23 38 3 56 2 30 1 8 0 610 29 ==Honours== Kashiwa Reysol * J.League Division 1: 2011 * J.League Division 2: 2010, 2019 * J.League Cup: 2013 * Emperor's Cup: 2012 * Japanese Super Cup: 2012 * Suruga Bank Championship: 2014 ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Chiba Prefecture
